# Missing data analysis

::: callout-caution
This tutorial is under construction! We are working hard to make this the best tutorial it can be. Thank you for your patience.
:::

This chapter is going to be about:

-   missing data and imputation
-   multiple imputation in complex survey data
-   multiple imputation then deletion (MID)
-   estimating model performance from multiple imputed datasets
-   dealing with subpopulations with missing observations
-   testing MCAR assumption empirically in the data
-   effect modification within multiple imputation
